name: Create Gist leads from Google Sheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added in Google Sheets, Make will automatically look a lead up in Gist using the email address. If the lead is not found it will create a new lead in Gist. This example uses (this sheet)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0].
